Job Description: Job Description   Build sophisticated technology for the PBS Professional product based on customer-driven requirements (aka design solutions).Write and shepherd designs through the entire software development process, from requirements and use cases to shipping product (aka write code).Apply best practices in software engineering, delivering projects on time, on budget, and with excellent quality.Modify existing software technology to correct errors and/or improve performance (aka fix bugs).Provide expertise to the support and sales organizations as well as other software engineers.Required Skillsc software development software engineering operating systems computer science Linux System Programm
